Class ncsa.hdf.object.H4File 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----java.io.File
            |
            +----ncsa.hdf.object.H4File
public class H4File
extends java.io.File
implements FileFormat
This class provides file level APIs. File access APIs include retrieving the file hierarchy, opening and closing file, and writing file content to disk.

Version:
1.0 12/12/2001
Author:
Peter X. Cao, NCSA

H4File(String, int)
Creates an H4File with specific full file name and access flag.

close()

isThisType(String)
Checks if the given file is an HDF4 file.
open()
 

H4File
public H4File(java.lang.String pathname,
              int flag)
          Creates an H4File with specific full file name and access flag.

Parameters:
pathname - the full path of the file name.
flag - the file access flag, HDF provides several file access code definitions:
DFACC_READ
Open for read only. If file does not exist, an error condition results.
DFACC_CREATE
If file exists, delete it, then open a new file for read/write.
DFACC_WRITE
Open for read/write. If file does not exist, create it.

isThisType
public static boolean isThisType(java.lang.String filename)
          Checks if the given file is an HDF4 file.

Parameters:
filename - the file to be checked.
Returns:
true if the given file is an HDF4 file; otherwise returns false.
